alert.note: Alert for Umatilla; Union (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:15PM PDT until July 02 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pendleton Oregon has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Umatilla County in northeastern Oregon... West central Union County in northeastern Oregon... * Until 400 PM PDT. * At 315 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Umatilla Reservation, or near Meacham, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pendleton, Meacham, Thorn Hollow, Kamela, Cayuse, Umatilla Reservation, Bingham Springs, Mission and Gibbon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
